snippet: Luiz Carlos Barreto's original career as a photographer had a lasting influence in his later work in film. Now one of Brazil's most respected producers, he recently looked back on the lessons learned.
abstract: Luiz Carlos Barreto's original career as a photographer had a lasting influence in his later work in film. Now one of Brazil's most respected producers, he recently looked back on the lessons learned.

headline.main: Forget the Light. Shoot the Shadows.
